ygData.subject: Re: Out for the fun of it.
ygData.msgSnippet: Wolfblade:: She felt his arms holding her.  She used all her will power to not move as he pleaded to her. Not being able to stand it any more, she reached up

Wolfblade::

She felt his arms holding her.  She used all her will power to not
move as he pleaded to her. Not being able to stand it any more, she
reached up and wrapped her arms tightly around his neck. Then, not
needing to open her optics, she leaned her head up and pressed her
lips against his. Her mech fluid tempurature rose instantly as her
lips met his. In her spark, she wanted to have this one moment last
forever.  Being held in his arms and kissing him.  In the history of
the kiss, only 5 were rated for being the most passionate and the most
pure.  She wanted this kiss to blow all them away. 




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> He was a bit out of breath before, but now was bordering on torture.
 His sensors told him she had stopped, and he slowed down to catch his
breath a bit.  But when he found her, his spark nearly extinguished
itself.  he rushed over to her, and gently picked her up.  He held her
limp body to his, worry deeply etched on his faceplates, hurt very
evident.  
>  
> "Wolfblade!  Wolfblade, speak to me!  Come on, wake up!" he said to
her, hoping his pleas would work.
>  
> He'd personally kill whoever did this to her.  He might not act like
it all the time, but he was a killer.
>
